title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
description: Find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

title: Output of Recursive Code
Coin Change - Minimum Coins
description: Given coin denominations and an amount, return the fewest coins needed to make up that amount.
input_format: An array of integers coins[], and an integer amount
output_format: Minimum number of coins or -1 if not possible
